snippet: Imposing more penalties on Tehran could cause negotiations to collapse and make war more likely.
abstract: Editorial warns that rare opportunity for diplomatic resolution to Iran's nuclear program is being put at risk because some lawmakers, urged on by Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu, are demanding tougher economic sanctions; calls on Congress to give Pres Obama leeway to negotiate a settlement, noting that sanctions can always be implemented at later date.
lead_paragraph: Imposing more penalties on Tehran could cause negotiations to collapse and make war more likely.

headline.main: Not the Time to Squeeze Iran
headline.print_headline: Not the Time to Squeeze Iran
